#summary ExtBuilder User Guide

= Introduction =

ExtBuilder is eclipse plugin can help developer work out good style Ext javascript code without typing code.


= Installation =
 # download from  [http://code.google.com/p/extbuilder/downloads/list]
 # drop it into your eclipse\plugins directory.
 # Restart you eclipse


== Create a new Ext Page ==
 Choose File->New, then select Web->ExtJs Page. a wizard dialog will appear.
